HeroSection.title: Quiet design Loud results
HeroSection.paragraphA: I'm a front-end developer who believes the best work speaks softly but leaves a strong impression.
HeroSection.paragraphB: I specialize in performance first websites and multilingual experiences, built to be fast, intuitive, and scalable. I don't chase trends. I deliver results that last.
